meanings.sent2: She collected the pomaces from the grapes to make vinegar.
meanings.sent3: The pomaces decided to have a dance party in the orchard.

meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the pomaces filled the air in the cider mill.

meanings.sent2: He used the pomaces from the peaches to make jam.
